headline: Willis flags new emerging risks facing defense industry
summary: Sector faces structural challenges driven by unexpected surge in demand yet constrained by economic nationalism, fiscal fragility and supply chain risksLONDON, Jan. 21, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- In an unstable geopolitical environment, defense contractors face new challenges. A new report from Oxford Analytica and Willis, a WTW business (NASDAQ: WTW), examines these risks through in‑depth interviews with senior executives across the defense industry.
